title: Tomato and Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: ['2 large tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '1/2 mild onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '1 dessertspoon chopped fresh parsley', '225g ciabatta, cut into 2.5cm slices', '4 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
